name: As long as I can fly
name_original: As long as I can fly
description:
A short game created in just one hour for Bitsy Crows game jam. Please be indulgent! ^_^

Just noticed I had a few hours before the jam ends and decided to create something ^_^ It's rather minimal, I hope you'll like it.

Music from my recent production, not available yet as an album

(v1.1 fixed some  useless logs in bitsy code)
